data.name: Spirit Overflow
data.detailed_description:
SET UP INSTRUCTION

We support both keyboard and bike trainer as game controller
If you wan to play using Bike trainer, check here for instruction: https://www.spiritoverflow.io/get-started

Step 1: Set up the equipment



You need 4 hardware to play spirit overflow:

1. PC
2. Mobile
3. Bike
4. Bike trainer

*You need your own bike for Spirit Overflow. Any bike that can be attached to your bike trainer is good to go.

The app should support all Bluetooth trainers. However, we could only test the following ones so far:

Wahoo Kickr Snap
Wahoo Kickr Bike
Wahoo Kickr Core
Elite SUITO
Elite Direto
Elite Direto XR
Misuro b+
Tacx Neo
4iiii FLIIIIGHT
Minoura KAGURA
Magene T300
Saris H3


*You might experience unknown issues with other untested trainers.

We are actively working on testing more trainers, so please contact us if you had issues with yours, or if your trainer worked, so that we can complete our list of supported trainers.

The set up should look like the image above.

*Please leave enough space on the front wheel for steering.
*it's recommended to put something under the front wheel to reduce the friction during steering (a towel or rotating swivels).
*Make sure you fix your mobile on the bike handle.

Step 2: Download software

Apart from Spirit Overflow on steam, you will need to download another app on your mobile. It's called Kinix Controller



Kinix Controller is used to control the steering, trigger in-game activities and connection to trainers.


Step 3:Connection

Before opening the app and the game, make sure:

1. Your PC and mobile are under the same WI-FI
2. Open Bluetooth on your mobile
3. Activate your bike trainer
4. Update the app to the newest version

Open the game and the app.
*If the game or the app is asking for authorization, please allow it.

After registering your account and server selection, you will see a "connecting to mobile" screen on PC, at the same time, you will see a "connecting to PC" screen on mobile. After a few seconds, they should be connected to each other automatically.



Then on the app it will start searching for trainers around you, choose one and connect.
After that, you are ready to play the game!

For more help: https://www.spiritoverflow.io/help


Join our Discord

https://discord.gg/fR5JVp8xue


About the Game

https://discord.gg/fR5JVp8xue

In Spirit Overflow, players compete in teams for territory and challenge other riders in online multiplayer battles.  Every match is an intense 3v3 battle that calls for skills, strategies and sweat.



Capture your territory
You will leave a trail after your character, when the trail forms a closed shape, you can capture a territory. When time is up, the team with more territory wins the game.



Use randomly generated items
Items will randomly appear in the arena which gives you a certain power-up, including healing, speed boost, and damage. Use them properly will give you the advantage over the opponents.




Ultimate skill
Activate your ultimate skill and hit your enemy! it can instantly kill an enemy.




Play alone or build your squad
Spirit Overflow is a team-based game where team strategy is essential to the victory. Like any other e-sport, you'll be able to create or join a team and play together with your squad. Bring your friends, party up, and build the strongest team!


*rendered video, in-game visual work in progress

data.short_description: Spirit Overflow is not another cycling simulator, it’s a fun-driven, adrenaline-pumping video game with competitive e-sports dynamics in its DNA. Every game is an intense 3v3 territory battle that calls for skills, strategies, and sweat. (Also Supports Keyboard)
data.supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Simplified Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500 / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 560 Ti / AMD Radeon HD 7850
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: These specifications are subject to change.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4690 / AMD FX-8320
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 950 / AMD Radeon HD 7970 / R9 280X
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: These specifications are subject to change.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Additional Notes: These specifications are subject to change.
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Additional Notes: These specifications are subject to change.
